rows.label: bf10390100_0120
rows.name: I'll show you it can change.

rows.label: bf10390100_0122
rows.name: It will change.

rows.label: bf10390100_0130
rows.name: That's why we've come all this way!

rows.label: bf10390100_0140
rows.name: Why go that far?

rows.label: bf10390100_0150
rows.name: For whose sake? For what purpose?

rows.label: bf10390100_0160
rows.name:
It's not for anyone's sake.
it's for myself.

rows.label: bf10390100_0170
rows.name: If it makes everyone happy...

rows.label: bf10390100_0180
rows.name: If it allows life to go on...

rows.label: bf10390100_0190
rows.name: Then that's my purpose!

rows.label: bf10390100_0200
rows.name: Shin asked me to take care of you...

rows.label: bf10390100_0210
rows.name: Shin didn't want to disappear...

rows.label: bf10390100_0220
rows.name: He just wanted to connect with you!

rows.label: bf10390100_0230
rows.name: He did it because you showed him a path!

rows.label: bf10390100_0240
rows.name: How many people do you think died because of that?

rows.label: bf10390100_0250
rows.name: Can you really forgive that?

rows.label: bf10390100_0260
rows.name: Of course I can't forgive it.

rows.label: bf10390100_0270
rows.name: But that's the world we exist in!

rows.label: bf10390100_0280
rows.name: We have no choice but to move forward within it.

rows.label: bf10390100_0290
rows.name: [ML:undisp]...

rows.label: bf10390100_0300
rows.name: Even you...

rows.label: bf10390100_0310
rows.name:
You've been moving forward that way too,
haven't you?
